forsake.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to leave someone, especially when you should stay because they need you
forsake.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to stop doing, using, or having something that you enjoy
forsake.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: She will never forsake her vegetarian principles.
forsake.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to leave a place, especially when you do not want to
forsake.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: He has forsaken his native Finland to live in Britain.
